alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin and central Escambia Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Gonzalez, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Baldwin and central Escambia Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
